body_html:
This breaks backwards compatibility (and all users who currently have an old graph built using the ctc loss, regardless of the argument's value), so we definitely cannot accept this PR as is!

Can you instead update the documentation, making it very clear what the arguments mean - and adding a warning about use cases? Julian's table looks like a very good item to add to the docs.

body:
This breaks backwards compatibility (and all users who currently have an old graph built using the ctc loss, regardless of the argument's value), so we definitely cannot accept this PR as is!

Can you instead update the documentation, making it very clear what the arguments mean - and adding a warning about use cases?  Julian's table looks like a very good item to add to the docs.
